name: Grey Garden 9
description:
Dreaming of gardening games for a while. Not a programmer. Used Playmaker plugin for Unity3d to help me create this toy/game. 

Grey Garden 9 - there's no 1 to 8. 

What you'll find. 

  • A simple prototype
  • Grow a garden, beautiful or optimized for $
  • Some strange flowers I drew 
  • A slow and zen like experience 

you can give me feedback in the comments or on this link

If you want to know when I put out a new game/prototype/art piece just subscribe to my newsletter - http://eepurl.com/dkOUQ1
